events.name: Game Hack
events.about:
What is GameHack?

It’s an overnight hackathon at the world famous Pinewood Studios and it’s all about making games! Big, small, native, web, single or multiplayer we think that together we can make something amazing.

Who should come?

Developers of any language, but games are more than code so if youre an artist, musician or designer we want you at GameHack!

So join us on Saturday the 28th of April and lets get gaming!
